description: This Java source file defines Data Transfer Objects (DTOs) for recipe-related data in a backend service. It includes nested static classes for ingredients, recipe requests, and recipe responses, with validation annotations and schema descriptions.

classes.name: RecipeDtos
classes.description: Container class for recipe DTOs, including nested classes for ingredients, requests, and responses.

classes.name: IngredientDto
classes.description: DTO representing an ingredient with a name and quantity.

classes.name: RecipeRequest
classes.description: DTO for creating or updating a recipe, including title, description, cook time, servings, category, and ingredients.

classes.name: RecipeResponse
classes.description: DTO for returning recipe data, including id, title, description, cook time, servings, category info, and ingredients.
